mapper.insert: insert into tbl_attach(uuid, uploadpath, filename, filetype, bno, previewimg) values (#{uuid}, #{uploadPath}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{bno}, #{previewImg})
mapper.select: select board.bno, writer, attach.filename from tbl_board board left outer join tbl_attach attach on board.bno = attach.bno where attach.previewimg = 1
